column4: where do the display drivers hide these days? I looked in the good old xorg.conf but there it just states configured device but not which drivers are used. Is there a gui now for these things? cheers
there is a restricted drivers gui thing somewhere
I cant change the drivers in there. It doesnt even show me. what it has. I think this laptop has a unichrome chip but is probably running on the standard vesa driver but I dont know.
